data.author: Benoit SERRA

changelog.release_notes: Different graphical layout and Wind speed and direction.
Added back support for legacy Pebble and Pebble Steel, removed by mistake (sorry guys !)

Pebble Time support
Switch to gisgraphy for provide geolocalisation
Handmade colors drawing by a friend of mine https://www.facebook.com/pages/Les-calligraphies-de-Laea/270037116348916?fref=ts

Added the possiblity to disable weather fetching at night

added hourly vibe

added invert screen posibility

added owner information and display it when the bluetooth connection goes down !

Added possiblity to add a few minutes to the time displayed : it may help the people who are always late.

Adding more icons (now there is an icon for every known condition. 
Using Google to geolocalise the user, but can work without GPS
Configuration panel
Permanent storage of weather data to avoid empty screen when loading the watchface.

Added battery and bluetooth indicators

Various optimizations in the code to have a better battery life.
Very first (and very incomplete) version of my own watchface

data.description:
Oweather is an app designed for the Pebble watch, which retrieves weather data from your current location. 

It displays a small icon on the watch face that indicates the weather. 

It uses the phone GPS, but you can enter the locality for which you want the current weather. 

When using the GPS, it retrieves the location from Gisgraphy's web service. 

The icons come a friend of mine Laea Sandra Bread : https://www.facebook.com/pages/Les-calligraphies-de-Laea/270037116348916?fref=ts

*timeline support is in progress*

For bug reports or features requests, please send an email to oupsman@oupsman.fr

latest_release.release_notes: Different graphical layout and Wind speed and direction.

data.title: oWeather
